title: Returns of corporations or partnerships
context: §231-15.6 Returns of corporations or partnerships. The returns, statements, or answers required under chapters of the law under title 14 administered by the department, in the case of a corporation, shall be made by any officer of the corporation, or in the case of a partnership, by any one of the partners. [L 1989, c 14, §1(4); am L 1991, c 263, §6; am L 1994, c 16, §1; am L 1995, c 66, §6]
